s: Single monitor arms like this NB North Bayou gas arm offer the most flexible viewing angles and allow me to mount and position the arms wherever I need them. The movement on the gas arm is very smooth and it's a pleasure to use. Very good quality and value for the price. It is very solidly built (I've used and discarded cheaper arms before!) and keeps my desk and cables tidy. Would highly recommend this brand ...
